Package jutil

Class JFiles

java.lang.Object
jutil.JFiles
public final class JFiles extends Object
Utility class for files

  • Method Details

    • countWords

      public static int countWords​(File file) throws FileNotFoundException
      Returns the number of tokens in file seperated by whitespace or newlines.
      Parameters:
      file - the file
      Returns:
      number of words in the file
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the file isn't found

    • countLines

      public static int countLines​(File file) throws FileNotFoundException
      Returns the number of lines in file.

      A \n counts as a new line.

      Parameters:
      file - the file
      Returns:
      number of lines in the file
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the file isn't found

    • readLines

      public static List<String> readLines​(File file) throws FileNotFoundException
      Reads the lines of file into a list of strings.

      Each line is read into a String and stored in an ArrayList

      Parameters:
      file - the file
      Returns:
      list of the lines of the file
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the file isn't found

    • readWords

      public static List<String> readWords​(File file) throws FileNotFoundException
      Reads the words of file into a list of strings.

      Token seperated by a whitespace or a newline are read as String and stored in an ArrayList.

      Parameters:
      file - the file
      Returns:
      list of the words of the file
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the file isn't found

    • read

      public static String read​(File file) throws FileNotFoundException
      Reads the entirety of file into a single continous String.

      New lines are removed and whitespaces are conserved.

      The file is traversed and each token is appended into a StringBuilder.

      Parameters:
      file - the file to read
      Returns:
      the file as a String
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the file isn't found

    • write

      public static void write​(File file, String text, boolean append) throws IOException
      Writes the given text into file.

      If true is passed to append the file contents are preserved and they are overwritten otherwise.

      Parameters:
      file - the file to write to
      text - the text to write to the file
      append - true preserves the contents and false overwrites them
      Throws:
      IOException - if the write operation to the file was unsuccessful

    • write

      public static void write​(File file, String text) throws IOException
      Writes the given text into file.

      This overwrites any previous data in the file. To write to the file without overwriting use write(File, String, boolean).

      Parameters:
      file - the file to write to
      text - the text to write to the file
      Throws:
      IOException - if the write operation to the file was unsuccessful

    • writeln

      public static void writeln​(File file, String text, boolean append) throws IOException
      Writes the given text into file and moves the cursor down one line.

      If true is passed to append the file contents are preserved and they are overwritten otherwise.

      Parameters:
      file - the file to write to
      text - the text to write to the file
      append - true preserves the contents and false overwrites them
      Throws:
      IOException - if the write operation to the file was unsuccessful

    • writeln

      public static void writeln​(File file, String text) throws IOException
      Writes the given text into file and moves the cursor down one line.

      This overwrites any previous data in the file. To write to the file without overwriting use writeln(File, String, boolean).

      Parameters:
      file - the file to write to
      text - the text to write to the file
      Throws:
      IOException - if the write operation to the file was unsuccessful

    • truncate

      public static void truncate​(File file) throws FileNotFoundException
      Deletes all the content in file.
      Parameters:
      file - the file to truncate
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the file isn't found
